title: HPLC-DAD method for simultaneous determination of gallic acid, catechins, and methylxanthines and its application in quantitative analysis and origin identification of green tea
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Silvia Jakabová, Július Árvay, Marek Šnirc, Jana Lakatošová, Alena Ondejčíková, Jozef Golian
